de.esoco.gwt.client.ui

Class DataElementInteractionHandler<D extends de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.DataElementInteractionHandler<D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler

    public class DataElementInteractionHandler<D extends de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler
    A class that handles the interaction events for a certain DataElement.

      • setupEventHandling

        public boolean setupEventHandling(de.esoco.ewt.component.Component rComponent,
                                  boolean bOnContainerChildren)
        Initializes the handling of interactive input events for a certain component if necessary.
        Parameters:
        rComponent - The component to setup the input handling for
        bOnContainerChildren - TRUE to setup the input handling for the children if the component is a container
        Returns:
        TRUE if the event handling has been initialized, FALSE if no event types have been registered and no event handling is necessary

      • getInteractionEventTypes

        protected java.util.Set<de.esoco.ewt.event.EventType> getInteractionEventTypes(de.esoco.ewt.component.Component rComponent,
                                                                               java.util.Set<de.esoco.lib.property.InteractionEventType> rInteractionEventTypes)
        Maps the interaction event types to the corresponding GEWT event types for a certain component.
        Parameters:
        rComponent - The component
        rInteractionEventTypes - The interaction event types to map
        Returns:
        The mapped GEWT event types

      • hasValueChanged

        protected boolean hasValueChanged(java.lang.Object rEventSource)
        Checks whether the value of an event source component has changed compared to the data element. This applies only to TextControl components to prevent unnecessary events on cursor navigation and similar, where the actual content doesn't change.
        Parameters:
        rEventSource - The event source to check
        Returns:
        TRUE if the value has changed

      • mapToInteractionEventType

        protected de.esoco.lib.property.InteractionEventType mapToInteractionEventType(de.esoco.ewt.event.EventType eEventType)
        Maps a GWT event type to the corresponding interaction event type.
        Parameters:
        eEventType - The event type to map
        Returns:
        The matching interaction event type

      • processEvent

        protected void processEvent(de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEvent rEvent)
        Processes a certain event and forwards it to the panel manager for interaction handling.
        Parameters:
        rEvent - The GEWT event that occurred

      • registerEventHandler

        protected void registerEventHandler(de.esoco.ewt.component.Component aComponent,
                                    java.util.Set<de.esoco.lib.property.InteractionEventType> rEventTypes)
        Registers an event listener for the handling of interactive input events with the given component.
        Parameters:
        aComponent - The component
        rEventTypes - The event types to register the event handlers for
